## Model

- Schaefer surplus-production model
- Log-normal process and observation errors

$$\begin{aligned}
I_t &= q B_t\\
I_t \mid P_t,q,\tau^2 &= q K P_t e^{v_t}\\
v_t &\sim \operatorname{Normal}(0, \tau^2)\\
P_1 \mid \sigma^2 &= e^{u_1}\\
P_t \mid P_{t-1},K,r,\sigma^2 &= \left[P_{t-1} + r P_{t-1}(1 - P_{t-1}) - C_{t-1} / K\right]e^{u_t}\\ 
 & \quad \quad \quad \quad \quad\quad\quad t = 2, \ldots, T\\
u_t &\sim \operatorname{Normal}(0, \sigma^2),
\end{aligned}$$
